generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the building, and also along the right side next to the grassy area.
- building: A modern building with a brown facade and large windows is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and some soil are visible along the right side of the road, behind the guardrails.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including one with traffic signs.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign and a circular "30" speed limit sign are visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy at the top center of the image.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood of the car is visible at the bottom center of the image, indicating the perspective is from inside a car.
